message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for a competitive price of $20,000. I believe it offers significant value, and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering its value.
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your budget considerations, but $12,000 is significantly below its true value. I could consider letting it go for $18,000.
I understand your perspective, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $15,000 for the product. I think that's a good compromise considering its value.
